intension: Design a poster to promote a charity bike ride event to raise funds and support for a humanitarian cause. The event will be held on June 26th and the website for registration and donation is www.funbike.com.
globalcaption: The image features a woman riding a bicycle on a blue background. She is wearing a white shirt and red pants, and her hair is in a ponytail. The bicycle has a basket attached to it, and the woman appears to be enjoying her ride. The scene is a simple, yet engaging illustration of a woman cycling for fun.
keywords: ride, charity, bicycle, race, biking, activity, healthy, sport, man, care, support, helmet, people, poster, tb, instagram, post, insta, ig, tb

bglayer.bgcaption: The image features a woman riding a bicycle on a blue background. She is wearing a red dress and is positioned in the center of the scene. The bicycle she is riding is located towards the right side of the image. The woman appears to be enjoying her ride, possibly on a sunny day, as she glides across the blue sky
